title: Rustc paniced when apply `.await` on a closure in a non-async function

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: AsyncAwait-Polish
labels.description: Async-await issues that are part of the "polish" area

body:
## Code
```rust
#![feature(async_await)]

fn main() {
    (|_| 2333).await
}
```
